welcome_message: Decide where to eat with your group in minutes. Create a session or join with a link.
info_create: Choose radius, filters, and vote threshold. Share the link with your group.
info_join: Paste the link you were sent or type the session ID.
two_people_threshold: With 2 people, the threshold is set to 2 (both must say YES).
tip_simple_majority: Tip: simple majority often works well (e.g., {{majority}} out of {{total}}).
select_one_cuisine: You must select at least 1 cuisine.
no_results: No results found with these filters
no_liked: You didn't give 'yes' to any this time.
threshold_not_reached: The threshold (‚â• {{needed}}) has not been reached yet.

errors.network_down: Could not connect. Check your connection and try again.
errors.session_not_found: The session does not exist or has expired.
errors.already_joined: You have already joined this session.
errors.server: Server error. Please try again in a few seconds.
errors.generic: Could not complete the action. Please try again.
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
errors.preview_failed: Could not preview results. Please try again.
errors.form_invalid: Review the filters and complete the required fields.
errors.conflict_action: The action cannot be completed due to a conflict. Please try again.
errors.cannot_create_session: Could not create the session. Please try again.
errors.timeout_retry: Timed out. Please try again in a few seconds.
errors.join_host_failed: Could not automatically join the host.
errors.session_status_failed: Could not check the session status.
